member.name: T:CrystalMpq.MpqFile
member.summary: This class represents a file in a MPQArchive

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.OnNameDetected(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called internally when the name has been detected.
member.param: If set to true, remember the filename.
If set to true, the name was detected from the listfile.
member.remarks: Right now, the method will only update the seed when needed.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Open
member.summary: Opens the file for reading.
member.returns: Returns a Stream object which can be used to read data in the file.
member.remarks: Files can only be opened once, so don't forget to close the stream after you've used it.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Open(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Opens a patched file for reading.
member.returns: Returns a Stream object which can be used to read data in the file.
member.remarks: This method should only be used for explicitly providing a base stream when the is a patch. Files can only be opened once, so don't forget to close the stream after you've used it.
member.exception: This instance of is not a patch.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Archive
member.summary: Gets the archive to whom this file belongs.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Name
member.summary: Gets the name for this file, or null if the filename is unknown.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Offset
member.summary: Gets the offset of this file in the archive.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of this file.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.CompressedSize
member.summary: Gets the compressed size of this file.
member.remarks: If the file is not compressed, CompressedSize will return the same value than Size.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Flags
member.summary: Gets the flags that apply to this file.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.IsEncrypted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this file is encrypted.
member.value: true if this file is encrypted; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.IsCompressed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this file is compressed.
member.value: true if this file is compressed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.IsPatch
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this file is a patch.
member.value: true if this file is a patch; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Lcid
member.summary: Gets the LCID associated with this file.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Index
member.summary: Gets the index of the file in the collection.
member.remarks: In the current impelmentation, this index is also the index of the file in the archive's block table.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Compressed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this file is compressed.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqFile.Listed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the file was found in the list file of the archive.
member.remarks: This can only be true if the list file was parsed.

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.ArchiveCorruptException
member.summary: Thrown when the archive appears to be corrupt.
member.remarks: It might happen that this error is thrown on a perfectly valid archive. If that's the case, please inform the author of this.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.ArchiveCorruptException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.Utility.SharedMD5
member.summary: Gets a shared implementation.
member.remarks: The shared object should be used with care, with the same rules as the shared buffer.
member.value: A object that can be used to compute a hash.

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.ArchiveInvalidException
member.summary: Thrown when the provided stream does not contain a valid MPQ archive

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.ResolveStreamEventArgs
member.summary: is used for applying a patch.
member.remarks: It is the responsibility to provide a valid stream.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.ResolveStreamEventArgs.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.ResolveStreamEventArgs.TransferStreamOwnership
member.summary: Transfers the stream ownership to the caller.
member.remarks: This method will return the value of and set the property to null afterwards. After a call to this method, the caller becomes responsible for managing the stream.
member.returns: The previously contained in this instance.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.ResolveStreamEventArgs.Stream
member.summary: Gets or sets the stream containing the data for the base file.
member.remarks: The instance of will take ownership of the stream.

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.InvalidMpqVersionException
member.summary: Exception thrown when the MPQ version is not recognized by the library.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.InvalidMpqVersionException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags
member.summary: Flags which can be applied to files in a MPQ archive.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.DclCompressed
member.summary: The file is compressed using DCL compression only.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.MultiCompressed
member.summary: The file is compressed using Blizzard's multiple compression system.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.Compressed
member.summary: The file is compressed using either method.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.Encrypted
member.summary: The file is encrypted with a seed.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.PositionEncrypted
member.summary: The encryption seed is altered with the file offset.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.Patch
member.summary: The file is a patch.
member.remarks: This should only be found whithin patch archives.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.SingleBlock
member.summary: The file is stored as a single unit and not in multiple blocks.
member.remarks: This was added with Burning Crusade.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.Deleted
member.summary: The file was deleted in a patch.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.SectorCrc
member.summary: The file has a CRC for each sector.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFileFlags.Exists
member.summary: The file exists. This flag should always be set for valid files.

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.MpqFormat
member.summary: This enumeraction gives information about the format of a given MPQ archive

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFormat.Original
member.summary: Original MPQ format.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFormat.BurningCrusade
member.summary: Extended MPQ format introduced with WoW - Brurning Crusade.
member.remarks: These archives can exceed the file size of 2 Gb, and possesses additionnal attributes for the contained files.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFormat.CataclysmFirst
member.summary: Enhanced MPQ format introduced with WoW - Cataclysm.
member.remarks: These archives can provide increased performance via the new hash table format.

member.name: F:CrystalMpq.MpqFormat.CataclysmSecond
member.summary: Enhanced MPQ format introduced with WoW - Cataclysm.
member.remarks: These archives build upon the previous format, providing more reliability and a potentially reduced file size.

member.name: T:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive
member.summary: This class is used to read MPQ archives. It gives you access to all files contained in the archive.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The listfile will be parsed if present.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Determines if the listfile will be parsed.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: The listfile will be parsed if present.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Determines if the listfile will be parsed.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.ParseListFile
member.summary: Parses the listfile if it has not already been done.
member.remarks: Once the list file has been parsed, calls this function will just do nothing. The list file will always be parsed by default, but you can override this behavior using an appropriate constructor. Please note that parsing the list file can take some time, and is not required if you already know the filenames. Also, this operation is irreversible. Once the filenames are present in memory, the only way to free the memory is to close the archive.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.TryFilename(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Associate the specified filename with files in the archive.
member.remarks: The filename will only be associated to matching files. If no file corresponds to the specified filename, nothing will happen. This function may be useful when you don't have a listfile for a given MPQ archive or when you just want to find some hidden files.
member.param: If set to true, the name was found in the listfile.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.TryFilename(System.String)
member.summary: Associate the specified filename with files in the archive.
member.remarks: The filename will only be associated to matching files. If no file corresponds to the specified filename, nothing will happen. This function may be useful when you don't have a listfile for a given MPQ archive or when you just want to find some hidden files.
member.param: The filename you want to try

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.FindFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Finds files with the specified filename.
member.remarks: This function will return all s matching the given filename. There might be more than one returned because of the localization.
member.param: The filename of the files to find.
member.returns: Returns an array of , containing zero or more .

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.FindFile(System.String)
member.summary: Finds one file the specified filename.
member.remarks: This function will only return the first result found.
member.param: The filename of the file to find.
member.returns: Returns an object if file is found, or null otherwise.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.FindFile(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds one file the specified filename and LCID.
member.param: The filename of the file to find.
The LCID of file to find.
member.returns: Returns an object if file is found, or null otherwise.

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.SetPreferredCulture(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the preferred culture to use when searching files in the archive.
member.remarks: It might happen that a given file exists for different culture in the same MPQ archive, but it is more likely that your MPQ archive is already localized itselfâ€¦
member.param: The LCID for the desired culture

member.name: M:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.ResolveBaseFileInternal(CrystalMpq.MpqFile)
member.summary: Resolves the data corresponding to the base file of a given patch .
member.returns: A containing the data for the base file if it was found; otherwise null.

member.name: E:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.ResolveBaseFile
member.summary: Occurs when the base file for a given should be resolved.
member.remarks: This event will be raised when opening an which is a patch file. Because patch files should be applied to a base file, it is needed to access to this file. The application is responsible for providing a stream containing valid data for this to work.

member.name: P:CrystalMpq.MpqArchive.HasListFile
member.summary: Gets a value that indicate whether the current archive has a listfile.
member.remarks: Having a listfile is not required for an archive to be readable. However, you need to know the filenames if you want to read the files.

member.summary: Gets the size of blocks in the archive.

member.summary: Gets a flag indicating the format of the archive.
